Description: 'Protect me', from the series 'The Temptation of St Anthony': the tiny figures of the saint kneeling in prayer in the midst of a storn of lines. c.2006 Pen and black ink
Curator's comments: One of a series of drawings on the temptation of St Antony. This drawing was exhibited at the Pushkin Museum of Fine Art in Moscow in 2009 in Steinmetz's one-man show titled 'Contemplating Gogol'.
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
